rules_text:
Any number of target players each draw a card.
Cirno, Sly Arcanist deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in their hand.
You get an emblem with “Whenever an opponent would draw a card outside of his or her draw step, instead you draw a card and this emblem deals 3 damage to that player.”
special_text:
[+2]: Any number of target players each draw a card.
[-2]: Cirno, Sly Arcanist deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in their hand.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “If an opponent would draw a card except during their draw step, instead you draw a card and this emblem deals 3 damage to that player.”
notes: fluffy: *muffled Tomboyish Girl in Love in the distance* (whenever—>if, outside—>except during, https://scryfall.com/search?q=o%3Aoutside+-o%3Agame&unique=cards&as=grid&order=set, Defence Grid, his or her—>their)
